prompts: Create a water-type Pokemon with bright blue fur and oversized ears reminiscent of a bunny.
Imagine a playful creature that loves to splash in ponds, featuring a round body and cheerful expression.
Design a Pokemon that resembles a small blue ball with white spots and big floppy ears.
Show me a cute aquatic Pokemon that has a bubbly personality and enjoys playing with friends.
Generate a Pokemon that thrives in grasslands and has a round shape with a cheerful vibe.
Make a Pokemon that is friendly and loves to swim, with large ears and a bubbly tail.
Give me a whimsical creature that combines the charm of a rabbit and the playfulness of water.
